dict.string: MY_BUNDLENAME=PHPCodeCompletion.tmbundle MY_LIB_BUNDLES_PATH="/Library/Application Support/TextMate/Bundles" if [ -d "$HOME/$MY_LIB_BUNDLES_PATH/$MY_BUNDLENAME" ] then PHPCC_BUNDLE_PATH="$HOME/$MY_LIB_BUNDLES_PATH/$MY_BUNDLENAME" else # ok not in UserBundles, so check in Lib Bundles and set path, else do nothing [[ -d "/$MY_LIB_BUNDLES_PATH/$MY_BUNDLENAME" ]] && PHPCC_BUNDLE_PATH="/$MY_LIB_BUNDLES_PATH/$MY_BUNDLENAME" fi export PHPCC_BUNDLE_PATH cat "${PHPCC_BUNDLE_PATH}/bin/includes/phpcc.functionslist.txt"|grep "^$TM_CURRENT_WORD"|sort
